attributes.action: order, or at least allow, an objective and non-biased report into the terrorist events in London on 7th July 2005
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An objective and independant report has never been published about the events of 7/7/05. We feel that many questions have remained unanswered and that there are many coincidences and anomalies in the official report.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
